chairs.game_description:
**1.** Join the game by clicking the button below.
**2.** The round will start and buttons will appear. You must click as fast as possible when a button becomes available. If the button is red, if time runs out, or if there are no more buttons to click, you will be eliminated from the game.
**3.** The last remaining player wins.
chairs.no_eliminated: No players were eliminated. The next round will start [timer].
chairs.game_ended: The game has ended. No one won because all players were eliminated.
chairs.next_round_starts: The next round will start in [timer]
chairs.pressed_already: You have already pressed a button this round.
chairs.pressed_button: This seat has been successfully reserved for you.

hide_seek.game_description:
**1.** Join the game by clicking the button below.
**2.** Players must choose a place to hide.
**3.** Each round, one player is chosen to search for the hiders.
**4.** That player selects a place to check; if a hidden player is found, they are eliminated.
**5.** The game ends when the last hidden player wins.
hide_seek.hide_timeout_eliminated: [users] were eliminated for not choosing a hiding spot in time.
hide_seek.all_eliminated: All players were eliminated. The game has ended with no winners.
hide_seek.seeker_timeout_eliminated: Seeker [user] was eliminated for not choosing a spot in time.
hide_seek.already_hidden: You have already chosen a hiding spot.
hide_seek.unavailable_spot: This spot is unavailable, please choose another one.
hide_seek.hide_selected: You have hidden in the **[spot]** spot.
hide_seek.eliminated: [hiders] were found in **[spot]** and eliminated by [seeker]

mafia.game_description:
**1.** Join the game by clicking the button below.
**2.** Players are randomly assigned to Mafia members, citizens, and one doctor.
**3.** Each round, the Mafia chooses a player to eliminate, then the doctor chooses one player to protect. At the end of the round, all players vote to eliminate one Mafia member.
**4.** If all Mafia members are eliminated, the citizens win. If the Mafia equals the number of citizens, the Mafia wins.
mafia.mafia_role: ğŸ•´ï¸ You are Mafia. Choose someone to eliminate.
mafia.doctor_role: ğŸ’‰ You are the Doctor. Choose someone to protect.
mafia.citizen_role: ğŸ¤µ You are a Citizen. Try to find and eliminate the Mafia.

mafia.investigate: ğŸ” You have [seconds] seconds to investigate.
mafia.vote: ğŸ² You have [seconds] seconds to vote for the killer.

mafia.protected: ğŸ›¡ï¸ Mafia failed due to Doctor's protection, [user].

roulette.game_embed_description:
**1.** Join the game
**2.** The first round will begin, and the wheel will spin to select a random player
**3.** If you are chosen, you'll pick a player to eliminate from the game
**4.** The selected player is kicked out, and the next round begins. When all players are eliminated, leaving two, the wheel spins, and the chosen player wins.
roulette.no_players: No one joined the game yet
roulette.already_not_player: You're not a player in this game!
roulette.removed_player: You've been removed from this game
roulette.already_in_game: You're already in this game. To change your position, you must exit the game and then rejoin.
roulette.absence_players: The game has been canceled due to the absence of at least [min_players] players.
roulette.game_will_start: Numbers have been assigned to each player. The first round will start in a few seconds...
roulette.final_round: â„¹ï¸ This is the final round! The selected player is the winner of the game.
roulette.chosen_player: You're the chosen player in this round. Get ready.
roulette.eliminate_player: You have **[seconds] seconds** to choose a player to eliminate.
roulette.inactive_user: [user] has been kicked out of the game for inactivity. The next round will start in a few seconds...
roulette.withdrawn_player: [user] has withdrawn from the game. The next round will start in a few seconds...**
roulette.player_kicked: [user] has been kicked out of the game. The next round will start in a few seconds...

commands.restore_no_access_roles_embed_descriptio: Can't restore roles permissions as I don't have access over them. Ensure my role position is higher than the roles to be restored, and try again.
commands.restore_some_roles_embed_description: **[accessRoles]** roles out of **[totalRoles]** will be restored. Ensure if I have access for the remaining roles if there. I'll attach reasons for each role below.
commands.not_found_reason: Role not found. Perhaps it has been deleted?

commands.same_action_anti_join_bots: Action cannot be the same as before!

process.no_access_perms_role: I'm unable to execute the action due to **role position or permissions**
process.rate_limit: I'm unable to execute the action due to **rate-limit**
process.discord_api_error: I'm unable to execute the action due to this Discord API error: [errorMsg]
process.unknown_error: I'm unable to execute the action due to an unknown error
